article_title: Obamacare ruling allows tens of thousands in Kansas, Missouri to keep subsidies
article_text: Plaintiffs in the much-anticipated case, King v. Burwell, had argued that ambiguous language in the 2010 Affordable Care Act – also known as Obamacare – restricted the payment of tax credits to people who live in the 16 states, and the District of Columbia, that have established their own insurance marketplaces.
